page.title: 03GARLIC GROWING, NEWCHURCH
page.content: The Arreton Valley has, over the past two years, developed into the major garlic growing area in the country. Studies have been completed into garlic growing methods in the United States of America and the findings have been put to good use by the growers at Mersley Farm, Newchurch. The harvested garlic is exported to many European Countries. Such is the interest in this relatively new crop for the island that it is to host a Garlic Festival in 1985. The Festival will take place in August, is to be sited at Arreton, and it is hoped will be an annual event. It will take tha form of a country fete with exhibits, games, crafts, sports and children's activities.
